ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1
Class ProjectReader

java.lang.Object
  ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.LineOfTextFileReader
      ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.ProjectReader

public class ProjectReader
extends LineOfTextFileReader

This class will read from the InputFile and instantiate the Project objects in the system. It is assumed that the InputFile is in the local directory, contains the various projects and each line of input is read and expected in the following format. 

                P001 Projet1 2012-12-20 2013-05-18 H
                |    |       |          |          |
                |    |       |          |          Priority (H=High, M=Medium, L=Low)
                |    |       |          Project end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
                |    |       Project start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
                |    Project name
                Project ID
The projects.txt file has been provided as an example file.

Version:
1.6, 2013-Sep-13
Author:
A.J. Lattanze, CMU

Method Detail

getProjectList

public ProjectList getProjectList(java.lang.String inputFile)
Reads a line of text from the input file. The line of text is then passed to the parsing method where it is parsed and a Project object is returned. The Project object is then added to the list. When a null is read from the Project file the method terminates and returns the list to the caller. A list that points to null is an empty list.

Parameters:
inputFile -
Returns:
The ProjectList properly populated

parseText

private Project parseText(java.lang.String lineOfText)
Parse lines of text that are read from the text file containing project information in the above format. Note that this is a private method.

Parameters:
lineOfText -
Returns:
A properly populated Project instance.
